definition: to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Both grammar-based and pronunciation-based formations of words are characterized by an unbalanced feature.
sentences.chinese: 其语法构词和语音构词具有不平衡性特征。

sentences.english: Both grammar-based and pronunciation-based formations of words are characterized by an unbalanced feature.
sentences.chinese: 其语法构词和语音构词具有不平衡性特征。

sentences.english: The two word-building is an important means of polysyllabic adverbs in Song Shu.
sentences.chinese: 这两种构词法是《宋书》中副词复音化的重要手段。

sentences.english: What's more, these characteristic morphemes can distinguish one dialect from another one.
sentences.chinese: 这些特色构词语素也是方言之间相区别的特征之一。

sentences.english: Are you ready for smoking hot word-building action?
sentences.chinese: 准备好了吗吸烟热点构词行动？

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the different formations of the disyllabic words in You Ming Lu, an anthology in Nan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南朝小说《幽明录》的复音词有多种构词方式。

sentences.english: Alphabetical word is a new word-formation in Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 字母词是汉语一种新的构词方式。

sentences.english: The author analyzes the characteristics of sports English vocabulary from the (aspects) of word-formation and usage.
sentences.chinese: 从构词和使用两个方面，分析了体育英语词汇的特点。

sentences.english: Word with suffix is one type of word-formation in Northeastern dialect.
sentences.chinese: 语缀型词语是东北方言的一种构词类型。

sentences.english: Reference object is the necessary part of words builiding and words usage.
sentences.chinese: 参照体是构词和用词时必不可少的。

sentences.english: Do you know word formation in English words?
sentences.chinese: 你知道英语单词的构词法吗？

sentences.english: Word-formation is one of the important methods of English learning.
sentences.chinese: 英语构词法是英语学习中的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: Through Word Parts Now for the next step.
sentences.chinese: 通过构词现在我们看下一步。

sentences.english: Creating new words according to Chinese way of word formation.
sentences.chinese: 按汉语构词法创造新词对译西方术语。

sentences.english: The specific properties of word formation and inflection are dealt with in subsequent chapters.
sentences.chinese: 具体性能构词和拐点处理，在以后的章节。

sentences.english: In the second chapter, we compare and contrast all most word-formation between English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 第二章对英汉语的构词法进行了细致的对比和分析。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
radical of a compound word (in European language)
language component/morpheme/individual characters (making up an expression)
